title: Sampler, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, flat metal, and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, cross, satin, back, rococo and couching stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Alphabet, initials in cartouche, pastoral scene with two shepherdesses, sheep, and a fountain with twelve patterns at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, flat metal, and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, cross, satin, back, rococo and couching stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-186.
